content:
[Ohio Senate 2024 | Columbus Metro (Franklin County - Upper Arlington/Dublin) | P6: M, 46, Financial advisor, Westerville, Trump 2020, moderate Republican]
Q: How does that shape your politics?
"Democrats think Ohio is Cleveland and Columbus. They ignore everyone else."
